column5: TexasGothic was built by its owners to occupy a wooden area in the town city limits of Tehuacana, Texas, rich in history, quiet, and interesting. It is close to National Historic Landmark Original Trinity University, walking paths, wooded areas, Cup of Joe Coffee Shop. Youâ€™ll love my place because of privacy, small township, its history, its focus on nativeamerican & western literature, 2 bathrooms, laundry, & 2 study areas. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
